thread.title: Lamar Odom's Dad Flashes Huge Smile After Hospital Visit
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom's Dad Flashes Huge Smile After Hospital Visit

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Lamar Odom's Dad Flashes Huge Smile After Hospital Visit
text:
Comments Joe Odom was photographed flashing huge smile as he made his way out of the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas, where Lamar has been treated. 
The condition of Lamar Odom has been showing major improvements as of late, and his father Joe Odom has been spotted visiting him at the hospital. The older Odom was photographed flashing huge smile as he made his way out of the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas, where his athlete son has been treated. Joe was spotted sporting black top and matching hat. He offered no single statement for awaiting photographers. Prior to his hospital visit, Joe was snapped over the weekend with a smile on his face while making a Walmart run on Friday, Oct. 16. The outing occurred in the wake of media reports mentioning his son Lamar has regained consciousness and been taken off the ventilator. 35-year-old Lamar was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel on October 13. After days of hospitalization, the former NBA star has been able to "open his eyes and make a sound." As of Sunday, October 18, he was able to leave his hospital bed and move to a chair with assistance.
